channel.title: snmp on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in snmp on Developer Playground

item.title: Install "SNMP Server" on Windows 10 and Ubuntu 18.04
item.description: 1. Windows 10 Pro Run powershell as Administrator Add-WindowsCapability -Online -Name “SNMP.Client~~~~0.0.1.0” Get-WindowsCapability -Online -Name “SNMP*” Set Windows SNMP Trap Events evntwin Powershell commands to monitor windows. (Use “| ConvertTo-Json”) CPU
